TopicTitle: Save corrupted (Seems to be related to uninstalling mods, but no apparent mod modules present on any crafts in save, deleting crafts fixed save)

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: I7 9700 | GPU: RTX 2060 | RAM: 32GB

 

Discord tag - aski0m

I was able to play normally this whole time, until I logged off yesterday. After trying several times to load into my save (see file below) it got stuck at the "creating Vessel" part of loading. I came, along with others who helped, to the conclusion that my file somehow corrupted. Ive heard that this might have to do with the 70 years of ingame time though Im not so sure about that being true.
